headline: Should Darden’s Steady Same-Store Sales And EPS Growth Reinforce Confidence For Darden Restaurants (DRI) Investors?
summary: Darden Restaurants recently delivered another quarter of steady same-restaurant sales growth above 3% and ongoing double-digit earnings-per-share gains, reinforcing its fiscal 2026 guidance. Analysts highlighted that this consistency, combined with management’s reaffirmed outlook, has reinforced confidence in Darden’s ability to sustain operational discipline despite cost pressures. We’ll now examine how this dependable same-restaurant sales growth shapes Darden Restaurants’ investment...

headline: Jim Cramer Says Olive Garden “Is Crushing It” and So Is Darden Stock
summary: Darden Restaurants, Inc. (NYSE:DRI) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s game plan this week. Cramer noted Olive Garden’s “minimal beef exposure” during the episode as he stated: “Next up, I like Thursday. Almost all of the restaurant stocks have been horrendous because of the soaring price of beef, which just refuses to come […]
